description: Exploratory parameter set for TW369 drift mathematics (Modelo A) — higher sensitivity to tension and stronger damping modulation.

tension_weights.notes: Same base formula as default: tension = energy_weight * mean(|scores|) + instability_weight * sqrt(variance(scores)).

severity.notes: Higher lambda to increase sensitivity of severity factor to mean tension, with same cap as default.

interpretation.positive: Flow from source plane into target plane.

evolution.notes: Higher damping_factor to allow stronger response to drift; min_factor kept consistent with default.

3.label: Cultural / Surface
3.description: Plane 3 represents cultural macro and visible behavior; receives feedback from plane 9 (structure → surface).

6.label: Semiotic / Tension
6.description: Plane 6 represents semiotic/media tension; receives flow from plane 3 (surface → tension).

9.label: Structural / Deep
9.description: Plane 9 represents deep structural forces; receives flow from plane 6 (tension → structure).
